title: kys = 2 weeks?

embed.description: Jaehyuk Choi / Diamond 2 19LP / 419W 393L Win Ratio 52% / Riven - 203W 151L Win Ratio 57%, Vayne - 56W 45L Win Ratio 55%, Rengar - 27W 21L Win Ratio 56%, Master Yi - 14W 20L Win Ratio 41%, Jayce - 12W 12L Win Ratio 50%

body: ive been playing league for 6 years and in my last ranked game, I had a ahri who kept spamming pinging and flaming my teammates. I muted her in chat but I didn't mute her pings because pings are mostly helpful even if he spams them sometimes. I got really frustrated at him because he would only flame, spam pings at me and my teammates, and he wouldn't play the game properly. If he's in my elo, he should be as good as me unless he was really good at coinflipping. He kept getting caught even when everyone pinged him back, and does not roam a single time. Since I have been getting afks, trolls, flamers, and inters in my past 10 games (i could only win about 6 because riots system just keeps on giving me those kind of players) I couldn't handle my good attitude and called him piece of shit and said kys then left (after game has ended). In game, because ahri was calling my jger trash and spamming pings on his chamption, I said if our jg is bad, you have to play better to make it up but ahri obviously kept flaming and spamming pings so I said just mute him and i muted him in chat. Now, I've never gotten banned before, but that just gave me a 2 week ban. I really don't think it is fair to give a 2 week ban for the first ever warning to a player who has never gotten banned before. I was trynna hit masters in a week or a month, but i guess I'll have to quit since 2 weeks of no playing is gonna decrease my skills and performance overall. Or, I could just keep playing but probably will die like 20 deaths every game because even if you report people with 20 deaths riot doesn't give them warnings or any bans.

10-game Chat Restriction
25-game Chat Restriction
14-day Suspension
Permanent Suspension
